imdb.plot outline: The hottest one-hour magazine show to hit Philippine television, Fashionistas By Heart is hosted by the fabulous trio Heart Evangelista, Jocas de Leon and Schinina Juban. The show focuses on the latest trends in the fashion world: designer clothes straight off the runway, hairstyles and makeup finds to watch out for, accessories that are most sought after, and even features about the hottest topic of all-boys. The show also highlights celebrities and what they keep in their closets, as well as ordinary women and their day-to-day fashion emergencies.
imdb.title: Fashionistas by Heart
